ygData.subject: more ammo in bard bug faction
ygData.msgSnippet: On the new server I started a wood elf bard.  Level 1, no spells and only his dead sexy newbie gear and tunic.  When down to PoD lift, stood near someone, but
ygData.messageBody:
On the new server I started a wood elf bard. Level 1, no spells and only
his dead sexy newbie gear and tunic. When down to PoD lift, stood near
someone, but well outside of melee range, as they polished off an orc pawn.

Uraahh... crap about crushbone...
Your faction with EmeraldWarrior got better.
bahbahbah


Huh?!!?

I didn't even have a song nor even a single point in singing. I considered
/reporting myself after I described this in detail (with supporting history)
in the /bug window however I heard that reporting yourself is also a good
way to get a warning from a GM... for what I don't know... :)
